EmailTemplate.name: VNS_FusionePCR Integration with VisiCAD.Webinar-This Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Week Using TriTech's Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
Join Charlie Barry, TriTech's Sr. Product Manager, to learn more about Fusion ePCR and its integration to VisiCAD. The presentation will provide a live demonstration of the integration as well as a high level overview of TriTech electronic patient care reporting solution.
DATE: Wednesday, October 26
TIME: 10 AM Pacific l 11 AM Mountain l Noon Central l 1 PM Eastern
PRESENTER: TriTech's Charlie Barry, Sr. Product Manager of Fusion ePCR
Register Now: http://offers.tritech.com/VNS_FusionePCRIntegrationwithVisiCAD_Registration.html
QUESTIONS? Jenny Clavero TriTech Marketing (858) 799-7362 jenny.clavero@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
